page.title: 08WORTHEN - HOUSING SURVEY
page.content: This is a survey of housing in the Worthen area.164 habitations were checked (97.0%) Most of the dwellings are made of{brick}(138);but other material are{concrete}(3);{stone}(23){ {wood}(3) (some buildings have walls of varying materials).Roof materials are{ {clay,asbestos,and concrete tiles}(109) {slate}(51){corrugated iron}(1){wood} (3) Most of the dwellings have gardens either front or back. The main heating of the dwellings are: 74 have {solid fuel}(coal/coke or wood), 32{electicity,}15{butane/calor {gas,}42 {oil,}and 1 {solar heating.
